availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry G. Miller (Union County, Tennessee, farmer.)

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, resident. Tennessee native. Married to Mary Miller. Father of Nancy Miller, James M. Miller, Eliza Miller, Farmon Miller, Sariah Miller, and Martha Miller. Farmer in Claiborne County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Clairborne County, Subdivision 7, p. 333A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 9, p. 479.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 9, p. 273A.
Find A Grave, "H. G. Miller (October 14, 1826-September 6, 1902)," Memorial #43817745, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43817745 (accessed January 30, 2020).
